articles.description: Newly released police footage shows NFL free agent Odell Beckham Jr. belligerently cursing at passengers aboard a taxiing American Airlines flight at Miami International Airport.
articles.content: Newly released police footage shows NFL free agent Odell Beckham Jr. belligerently cursing at passengers aboard a taxiing American Airlines flight at Miami International Airport and refusing to leave… [+5695 chars]
